channel.title: csv on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in csv on An old coder

item.title: More Csv Work
item.description: I finally managed to finish my csv to JSON workflow. I originally tried usingMiller to export my csv to JSON but it didn’t provide all of the options that I needed. I managed to find a node library called csvtojson that had all of the tools I needed. It also lets you edit the header names to create nested JSON data in a way that I needed as well. I will be keeping Miller handy though as I will have more csv work to do in the future.
